types.html:
garder espoir

  1. to keep hope alive, not to give up hope; to remain hopeful (that)
    Antonym: perdre espoir
    Je garde espoir que tout finira par rentrer dans l'ordre. ― I remain hopeful that everything will sort itself out eventually.
trans: to keep hope alive, not to give up hope

title: garder espoir
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /ɡaʁ.de ɛs.pwaʁ/, /ɡaʁ.de.ʁ‿ɛs.pwaʁ/
